casebody.data:
LAWYERS MORTGAGE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Charles W. ANDERSON, as Collector, etc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 109. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 12, 1935. Harry W. Forbes, of New York City, for appellant.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed in open court on authority of Lawyers’ Mortgage Co. v. Anderson (C.C.A.) 67 F. (2d) 889.
